revisionDesc.change: updated bibliographic/recipient information from "a Soldier" to "Anson Ryder, Jr." based on Ted's review of the letter
added TEI header structure w/o IDs and titles; added minimal TEI markup
pulled transcription from Primary Source Media

body.p: . . . As to me, I lead rather a dull life here. I wish you were nearer, that we might be together frequently. I do not associate much with the department clerks, yet many appear to be good fellows enough. The contest between Congress and the President is quite exciting. I go up to the Capitol and listen to the speeches and arguments. Sometimes I feel as if one side had the best of it and then the other. Well, my dear comrade, I believe I have told you all the news—of Eicholtz, the German sergeant with the bad compound fracture, of Frazee and Dr. Smith.
